name: Frontline Scary Zombie Booth
description:
Frontline Scary Zombie Booth is the new free shooting real zombie war game of the year.
You and your sniper rifle are the only survivors of a zombie infection. In this zombie death free shooter game a virus infected the whole world except you. Your entire city is infected and blood is everywhere.
FEATURES

- 3D shooting zombie environment
- Stunning HD zombie frontier shoot target graphics
- Captivating soundtrack and effects strike zombie
- Unique zombie craze Missions
- One of the most kill dead zombie objective epic weapons and arsenal
- Tons of different items to support your energy and stamina
- Tough Boss battles designed to push you to the limit
